alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 18 at 10:47PM CDT until September 18 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PIKE...SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS AND BROWN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL ILLINOIS... At 1047 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Buckhorn to Beverly, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Barry, Griggsville and Pittsfield. This also includes Siloam Springs State Park. This includes Interstate 72 between exits 20 and 35. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
